articles.description: Watch live BBC television coverage, listen to radio commentary and follow text updates as Scotland host Ireland in the Men's Six Nations.

articles.description: India take an unassailable 2-0 lead in the one-day international series against England after Rohit Sharma's superb century in Cuttack.
articles.title: England in India: Rohit Sharma hits century to power hosts to ODI series win

articles.description: Rookie fly-half Fin Smith showed England there is another way to play after stepping in for maverick Marcus Smith says Matt Dawson.
articles.title: Six Nations: Fin Smith gives England new dimension - Matt Dawson

articles.description: We've got Super Bowl 59 predictions from our BBC Sport team along with TV analysts, current NFL players and even Hollywood stars.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2025 predictions: Who will win between the Chiefs and the Eagles?

articles.description: Tributes are paid to John Cooney who died a week after sustaining a brain injury in a Belfast bout.
articles.title: John Cooney: Boxing community 'devastated' by fighter's death

articles.description: The debate over the use of technology in football is nothing new - but in the FA Cup fourth round its absence has provided a frequent talking point.
articles.title: FA Cup: Lack of video assistant referee technology felt in fourth round

articles.description: Even in the Eternal City, time could be running out for the Wales head coach after a 14th Test defeat in a row.
articles.title: Warren Gatland: Head coach's future in doubt after Wales leave Rome in ruins

articles.description: A clinical Australia complete a nine-wicket victory over Sri Lanka early on day four in Galle to seal a dominant 2-0 series win.
articles.title: Australia in Sri Lanka: Tourists complete nine-wicket victory to seal 2-0 series win
